General.Name: Eneva S.A
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Eneva S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated power generation company in Brazil. It generates electricity through coal, natural gas, and solar energy. The company has an operational installed generation capacity of 3.7 GWs. It also engages in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas and hydrocarbon; and energy trading activities. The company was formerly known as MPX Energia S.A. and changed its name to Eneva S.A. in October 2013. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Praia de Botafogo,, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 22250-040
